name: Matryoshka (ahmatef)
description:
After a sudden accident you find yourself in a room filled with objects from your past. Also you find yourself able to change your size at will, use that ability to explore and find out why you're there and how to leave.

I tried to apply the theme of contrast and control by having you control your size and the contrast in between dealing with the environment in different sizes.

Controls: 

left stick to move

grab the air and pull closer or farther to change size

Game is obviously unfinished but it's my first VR game and i'm honestly proud of it. if you can get any enjoyment out of it that'd be the best outcome i can hope for.
